column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Thank you Bavette's for a fantastic evening. My girlfriend and I were invited to have dinner here and it was worth every penny. The staff was very efficient
column2: you can tell this is a solid team. The outside patio felt intimate and the interior is stylish and romantic. All the portion sizes are quite generous. We had the beef tartare
column4: amazing! I split my steak in half and it only took two cuts of the knife. Truly an exceptional restaurant.
